name: Closers: Premium Super Sale Pack
detailed_description:
Welcome to Closers! If you’d like to make the most of fighting alien monsters and saving the world, you’ll like this pack of handy in-game items and perks! (The Premium Super Sale Pack is limited to one per account.)

The Premium Super Sale Pack contains:

  • Visual unlock for all clothing slots—Get the costume stats you need, with the costume look you love! (Does not apply to accessory slots.)
  • 3-Star, 4-Piece Perfect Soldier Accessory Set—Accessories for your upper and lower head, hands, and feet…with a set bonus for wearing all four at once.
  • 30-Day Elite Status Voucher—Get the most out of Closers with a month of elite status!
  • 30-Day Maid Service Voucher—Improve your explorations for a full 30 days.
  • 30-Day Gardening Voucher—Increase the number of times you can plant seeds…and get a free Rainbow Seed each day.
  • +12 Gear Booster—Enhance an item all the way up to +12 in one fell swoop!
